content: Investments Robo-Advisors SeedlyTV EP04 Supplementary Retirement Scheme (SRS) Asked by Dousa MoobeeAsked on 06 May 2019What criteria does the government use to allow SRS to be used for robo advisors?1 answerAnswerBump0

HC Tang, Financial Enthusiast, Budgeting at The SocietyLevel 8. WizardAnswered on 13 May 2019The robo advisors basically invest in approved index  funds / ETP under SRS approval criteria:
